Sequence Information.Source: Litoria aurea (Green and golden bell frog)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity against L.lactis, L.innocua, M.luteus, S.aureus, S.epidermidis and S.uberis. Probably acts by disturbing membrane functions with its amphipathic structure. Shows anticancer activity.

Literature.Title: The antibiotic and anticancer active aurein peptides from the australian bell frogs Litoria aurea and Litoria raniformis the solution structure of aurein 1.2.
Literature.Author: Rozek T, Wegener KL, Bowie JH, Olver IN, Carver JA, Wallace JC, Tyler MJ.
